text: Red Velvet () is a South Korean girl group. It was formed in 2014 with four members: Wendy, Irene, Joy and Seulgi. Their first song called "Happiness" was released in August 2014. Later in March of 2015, their label, SM Entertainment, added Yeri to the group. Since then, the group has been active with five members. == Members == * Irene () * Seulgi () * Wendy () * Joy () * Yeri () == Discography == === Albums === Korean albums *The Red (2015) *Perfect Velvet (2017) *Chill Kill (2023) Japanese album *Bloom (2022) === Extended plays === Korean EPs *Ice Cream Cake (2015) *The Velvet (2016) *Russian Roulette (2016) *Rookie (2017) *The Red Summer (2017) *Summer Magic (2018) *RBB (2018) *The ReVe Festival: Day 1 (2019) *The ReVe Festival: Day 2 (2019) *Queendom (2021) *The ReVe Festival 2022 – Feel My Rhythm (2022) *The ReVe Festival 2022 – Birthday (2022) Japanese EPs *#Cookie Jar (2018) *Sappy (2019) === Non-album singles === *"Happiness" (2014) *"Be Natural" (2014) *"세가지 소원 Wish Tree" (2015) *"Would U" (2017) == References == == Other websites == Category:2010s South Korean music groups Category:2014 establishments in South Korea Category:2020s South Korean music groups Category:K-pop music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2014 Category:Musical quintets Category:SM Entertainment artists Category:South Korean girl groups Category:South Korean R&B; bands
title: Red Velvet (group)
